member.name: T:AddinExpress.ToolbarControls.ADXControlAdapter
member.summary: The base class for application-specific control adapters of Add-in Express Toolbar Controls Microsoft Office.

member.name: T:AddinExpress.ToolbarControls.ADXExcelControlAdapter
member.summary: The Excel-specific control adapter of Add-in Express Toolbar Controls Microsoft Office. When added to an Add-in Module, embeds .NET controls bound to Advanced Control components into the corresponding command bar in Excel.

member.name: T:AddinExpress.ToolbarControls.ADXOutlookControlAdapter
member.summary: The Outlook-specific control adapter of Add-in Express Toolbar Controls Microsoft Office. When added to an Add-in Module, embeds .NET controls bound to Advanced Control components into the corresponding command bar in Outlook.

member.name: T:AddinExpress.ToolbarControls.ADXPowerPointControlAdapter
member.summary: The PowerPoint-specific control adapter of Add-in Express Toolbar Controls Microsoft Office. When added to an Add-in Module, embeds .NET controls bound to Advanced Control components into the corresponding command bar in PowerPoint.

member.name: T:AddinExpress.ToolbarControls.ADXWordControlAdapter
member.summary: The Word-specific control adapter of Add-in Express Toolbar Controls Microsoft Office. When added to an Add-in Module, embeds .NET controls bound to Advanced Control components into the corresponding command bar in Word.

member.name: E:AddinExpress.ToolbarControls.ADXControlAdapter.ControlNeeded
member.summary: Occurs before the actual control is created. Allows specifying the control to show.

member.name: T:AddinExpress.ToolbarControls.ADXEvents_ControlNeeded
member.summary: Represents the method that will process the ControlNeeded event of the ADXControlAdapter class.
member.param: The ADXCommandBarAdvancedControl that is the cause of the event.
The control to show. If this parameter is left unchanged (null or Nothing in VB), the control will be instanciated via Reflection.
